backend/main.mo: Initializes access control state and mixes in authorization behavior into the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles and behaviors of various frontend files.
frontend/docs/production-promotion.md: Runbook describing steps for promoting a draft frontend build to production.
frontend/docs/smoke-test-live.md: Manual smoke test checklist for validating the live production environment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, error boundary wrapper, and main application structure.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and renders a fallback UI with reset handling.
Layout wrapper providing page structure and footer displaying version and branding.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Stores owner WhatsApp number and a helper validating that it is properly configured.
frontend/src/config/frontendVersion.ts: Defines the static frontend version string for deployment verification.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor, initializing access control and refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient and exposing identity state and login/logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin checks, customer CRUD actions, and loan retrieval using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines custom CSS variables for light and dark theme styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AddCustomerPage: Implements an admin form to create new customers with validation, permission checks, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin layout with session checks, identity validation, admin permission gating, and sign‑out flow.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSignInPage: Admin sign‑in form that validates email, triggers Internet Identity login, and creates an admin session before navigating to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/LoansPage.tsx: Admin interface listing all loans with actions to record EMI payments or close loans, each triggering WhatsApp messages and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerHome: Customer portal home page showing session info, a request submission entry point, and a sign‑out action.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerRequ: Customer form to submit finance requests, validates input, then opens WhatsApp with a pre-filled message and shows a success screen.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerSign: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with navigation to the customer portal.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 error page with options to go back or return home.
frontend/src/state/session.ts: Manages admin and customer session state using sessionStorage, including email storage and authorization helpers.
frontend/src/types/loan.ts: Local TypeScript definitions for loans, EMIs, and customer data matching backend structures.
frontend/src/utils/email.ts: Utility functions for normalizing emails and checking if an admin email matches the allowed address.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Utilities for formatting WhatsApp messages and generating links for customer requests, EMI updates, and loan closures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended colors, animations, and custom typography and container plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, feature requests, and configuration metadata for a fix-oriented workflow.
